ARABIC: ٱللَّهُ لَآ إِلَٰهَ إِلَّا هُوَ رَبُّ ٱلْعَرْشِ ٱلْعَظِيمِ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: Allah - there is no god but Him - the Lord of the Mighty Throne.'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: God: There is no god but He, the Lord of the glorious throne."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: Allah - none is worthy of worship save He; He is the Lord of the Mighty Throne.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: God is the only Lord and master of the Great Throne."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: “Allah – there is no True God except Him, the Owner of the Great Throne.” (Command of Prostration # 8)
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: Allah, La ilaha illa Huwa, the Lord of the Supreme Throne!"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: Allah, there is no god but He: He is the Lord of mighty power.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: God: there is no god but He, the Lord of the Mighty Throne.'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: Allah; there is no Allah save Him, the Lord of the Tremendous Throne.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: He is God: there is no deity but He, the Lord of the mighty throne."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Allah! there is no God but he, the Lord of the Magnificent Throne.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: Allah—there is no god except Him—is the Lord of the Great Throne.’
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: Allah!- there is no god but He!- Lord of the Throne Supreme!"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: Allah, La ilaha illa Huwa (none has the right to be worshipped but He), the Lord of the Supreme Throne!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: Allah, there is no god except He, the Lord of the Mighty Throne'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: God—There is no god but He, the Lord of the Sublime Throne.”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: Allah - there is no deity except Him, Lord of the Great Throne."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [27:26] God — there is no god except Him, the Lord of the Mighty Throne’ (this clause constitutes an [independent] new sentence, which is a eulogy comprising [praise of] the Throne of the Compassionate One to counter the [description of the] throne of Bilqīs: between the two, however, is an unfathomable difference).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (Allah; there is no God save Him, the Lord of the tremendous Throne.
